title: Le Monde de demain
overview: Social and musical chronicle on the beginnings of a cultural revolution, this fiction in 6 episodes retraces the beginnings of the group NTM formed by Kool Shen and JoeyStarr and the emergence of the French hip hop scene in the 80s. characters of Dee Nasty, the first importer and DJ of rap music in France, and the dancer and graffiti artist Lady Five.
